NEAT = 'AEFHIKLMNTVWXYZ'
a = input()
print('YES' if all(x in NEAT for x in a) or all(x not in NEAT for x in a) else 'NO')

lin = set(list("AEFHIKLMNTVWXYZ"))
cur = set(list("BCDGJOPQRSU"))
s = set(list(input()))
if lin | s == lin or cur | s == cur:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

lin = set(list('WETYIAFHKLZXVNM'))
s = input()
print('YES' if len(set(list(s)).intersection(lin)) in [len(set(list(s))), 0] else 'NO')

a = input()
print(('NO', 'YES')[sum(x in 'AEFHIKLMNTVWXYZ' for x in a) in (0, len(a))])
a=input();print(('NO','YES')[sum(x in'AEFHIKLMNTVWXYZ'for x in a)in(0,len(a))])
a=input();print(('NO','YES')[sum(x in'AEFHIKLMNTVWXYZ'for x in a)in(0,len(a))])
